name: Decisions Outcome Inventory Survey
description: An inventory designed to designed to assess whether individuals reach satisfactory outcomes, specifically whether they avoid negative decision outcomes.
instructions: The following questions ask whether different events have happened to you in the last 10 years. Please indicate “yes” or “no” for each.
reference: Bruine de Bruin, W., Parker, A. M., & Fischhoff, B. (2007). Individual differences in adult decision-making competence. Journal of Personality and Social Psychology, 92(5), 938-956. doi: 10.1037/0022-3514.92.5.938
